Headline: CTA Train Tracker May Be Temporarily Unavailable
ShortDescription: Info from CTA Train Tracker may be temporarily unavailable due to planned maintenance. Train service is not affected.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Information from CTA Train Tracker SM may be temporarily unavailable due to planned maintenance. Train service is unaffected.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Normal
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Princeton, 51st, Halsted and 47th, due to HAZMAT spill near 47th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Princeton, 51st, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 47th, due to HAZMAT spill near 47th/Normal.

Allow extra travel time.
